title: GCrypto
content:
#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

**Get Started with GCrypto**

- [Can I open a GCrypto account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/9781079085081-Can-I-open-a-GCrypto-account)
- [What coins can I trade in GCrypto?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/9781218166041-What-coins-can-I-trade-in-GCrypto)
- [What are the GCrypto Networks and Fees I need to know about?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/22747167650201-What-are-the-GCrypto-Networks-and-Fees-I-need-to-know-about)

**Top Up or Withdraw with GCrypto**

- [How can I withdraw from my GCrypto Trading Wallet?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31304830152089-How-can-I-withdraw-from-my-GCrypto-Trading-Wallet)
- [How much are the transaction limits for the GCrypto Trading Wallet?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31303981320473-How-much-are-the-transaction-limits-for-the-GCrypto-Trading-Wallet)
- [What is the GCrypto Trading Wallet?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31303868127897-What-is-the-GCrypto-Trading-Wallet)
- [How can I top up my GCrypto Trading Wallet?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/10200245771545-How-can-I-top-up-my-GCrypto-Trading-Wallet)

**Buy and sell crypto via GCrypto**

- [How do I use limit orders in GCrypto?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/39911228301337-How-do-I-use-limit-orders-in-GCrypto)
- [How do I check the status of my GCrypto order?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31307289104153-How-do-I-check-the-status-of-my-GCrypto-order)
- [How can I sell crypto in GCrypto?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31306888871833-How-can-I-sell-crypto-in-GCrypto)
- [What are the minimum and maximum limits for an order in GCrypto?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31305985539865-What-are-the-minimum-and-maximum-limits-for-an-order-in-GCrypto)
- [How can I buy crypto in GCrypto?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/9781977718425-How-can-I-buy-crypto-in-GCrypto)

**Send and Receive Crypto with GCrypto**

- [How can I send crypto over PHP 50,000 to another wallet or exchange in GCrypto?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31308558631321-How-can-I-send-crypto-over-PHP-50-000-to-another-wallet-or-exchange-in-GCrypto)
- [How can I receive crypto using GCrypto?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/10203149752601-How-can-I-receive-crypto-using-GCrypto)
- [How can I send crypto below PHP 50,000 to another wallet or exchange in GCrypto?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/10203037376025-How-can-I-send-crypto-below-PHP-50-000-to-another-wallet-or-exchange-in-GCrypto)

**Manage your GCrypto Account**

- [How can I close my GCrypto account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31308971000217-How-can-I-close-my-GCrypto-account)
- [How can I update my account information in GCrypto?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31308652046361-How-can-I-update-my-account-information-in-GCrypto)
- [How can I update the details in my GCrypto account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/10333738279321-How-can-I-update-the-details-in-my-GCrypto-account)

**Get Help with GCrypto**

- [My crypto transaction has not been reflected in my GCrypto Wallet. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31310333948697-My-crypto-transaction-has-not-been-reflected-in-my-GCrypto-Wallet-What-do-I-do)
- [I can’t send or receive crypto in GCrypto. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31309702924441-I-can-t-send-or-receive-crypto-in-GCrypto-What-do-I-do)
- [I topped up my GCrypto wallet but it has not been reflected yet. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31309647263001-I-topped-up-my-GCrypto-wallet-but-it-has-not-been-reflected-yet-What-do-I-do)
- [I can’t access my GCrypto account. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31309514462873-I-can-t-access-my-GCrypto-account-What-do-I-do)
- [I can’t buy/sell on GCrypto. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31309437398041-I-can-t-buy-sell-on-GCrypto-What-do-I-do)
[See all 7 articles](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/sections/31268609167001-Get-Help-with-GCrypto)

Back to Top

description: Register to GCrypto and top up your trading wallet for free! Buy, sell, send, receive, and learn about crypto - all in one app
